definition: cannot bear or stand/be unequal to/very/extremely

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
you can't guard against it (idiom)/impossible to defend effectively/not much one can do about it/It can't be prevented.
too numerous to mention individually or one by one
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
to triumph in every battle (idiom); invincible/to succeed in every undertaking
not to be up to the task (idiom)/incompetent
unable to put up with (sth) any longer
to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering/ever victorious/nothing they can't do
pinyin: zhan4 wu2 bu4 sheng4 , gong1 wu2 bu4 ke4

definition: to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering/ever victorious/nothing they can't do
pinyin: zhan4 wu2 bu4 sheng4 , gong1 wu2 bu4 qu3

definition: to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering/ever victorious/nothing they can't do
pinyin: gong1 wu2 bu4 ke4 , zhan4 wu2 bu4 sheng4

sentences.english: It was evident that her physical strength could not support her strenuous task.
sentences.chinese: 繁重的工作顯然使她有些力不勝任。

sentences.english: We thank you for your consideration in making us the consignment of 30 bales of cotton goods.
sentences.chinese: 貴方欲委託敝公司銷售棉織品30包，我方不勝感激。

sentences.english: Vote me for the 2011 all-stars. Great appreciation.
sentences.chinese: 爲我2011全明星投票吧，不勝感激。

sentences.english: They have now endured seven defeats in all competitions and there are a lot of stiff challenges still.
sentences.chinese: 他們在各項賽事中已輸掉七場，而硬仗還數不勝數。

sentences.english: Things explode. These are the emergencies and disasters that we have nightmares about.
sentences.chinese: 噩夢般的緊急事件與災難這樣的事情不勝枚舉。

sentences.english: Nature is full of color temperature examples.
sentences.chinese: 大自然是色溫的例子數不勝數。

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of 20 May 2000.
sentences.chinese: 二零零零年五月二十日來函收到，不勝感激。

sentences.english: The view of the lake from here is great.
sentences.chinese: 從這兒看到的湖景美不勝收。

sentences.english: These expectations of Jillian’s came as a surprise to Stephen once they were married.
sentences.chinese: 他們一結了婚，吉利安的這些期望令史蒂芬不勝驚訝。

sentences.english: A: We really appreciate if you could send us the payment on time.
sentences.chinese: 如果您能按時付款的話我們將不勝感激。

sentences.english: See LiuMin seems to some let go, victory however because be has no head for wine drunk.
sentences.chinese: 眼看劉敏似乎有些鬆口，勝利卻因不勝酒力醉倒了。

sentences.english: The heroic deeds of the people's soldiers are too numerous to enumerate.
sentences.chinese: 人民子弟兵的事蹟舉不勝舉。

sentences.english: We highly appreciate your early reply.
The artificial ways of inducing sleep are legion, and are only alike in their ineffectuality.
sentences.chinese: 人爲的催眠法多不勝舉，唯一的相同處是全都無效。

sentences.english: Your prompt reply will be very much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 如能及時回覆，將不勝感激。

sentences.english: The new manager kissed all unqualified workers off.
sentences.chinese: 新經理解僱了所有不勝任工作的工人。
